conflicts.name: %intel
conflicts.description: Intel compiler not working with this specific version of RegCM (generates a bug at runtime): please install a newer version of RegCM or use a different compiler.

variants.name: singleprecision
variants.description: Build RegCM using single precision float type.

variants.name: extension
variants.description: Build extensions for a specific architecture. Only available for GCC and Intel compilers; moreover, GCC builds only one architecture optimization.

variants.name: pnetcdf
variants.description: Build NetCDF using the high performance parallel NetCDF implementation.

dependencies.name: netcdf-c
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.

dependencies.name: netcdf-fortran
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the Fortran
distribution.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MVAPICH2-GDR is an optimized version of the MVAPICH2 MPI library for
GPU-enabled HPC and Deep Learning Applications. MVAPICH2-GDR is not
installable from source and is only available through a binary mirror.
If you do not find the binary you're looking for, send us an email at
mvapich@cse.ohio-state.edu. The binary mirror url is:
http://mvapich.cse.ohio-state.edu/download/mvapich/spack-
mirror/mvapich2-gdr/
